laboratory_examinations.findings: Positive results (diameter at 2 different test sites, 2 mm and 3 mm)
Pus from liver abscess contained M. avium-intracellulare; isolates were resistant to amikacin, rifabutin, clarithromycin, and ciproï¬‚oxacin, but susceptible to ethambutol.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: After 4 weeks of treatment, the E. faecium isolate was susceptible to penicillin, ampicillin, and amoxicillin but had become resistant to linezolid.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Partial deficiency in IFN-g response compared with control subjects.
Partial defect in IL-12p40 and a complete defect in production of IL-12p70 to BCG plus IFN-g.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Normative responses to BCG alone or to BCG plus IL-12 for the production of IFN-g.
